content: for a doily approximately 22 inches in diameter * the famous puritan mercerized crochet cotton article 40 3 balls white * steel crochet hook no 7 for a doily 16 inches in diameter * gem mercerized crochet cotton article 35 size 30 2 balls white * steel crochet hook no 12 listed as 28 diameter in american school of needlework #1094 uses 675 yards of size 10 with a size 7 steel hook called flower and fern mat in mccalls
